Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place carrots, apples, and water into a pot. Bring to a boil; cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer until soft, 10 to 15 minutes.

Directions.3: Crack eggs and whisk together in a bowl; place eggshells onto a baking sheet.

Directions.4: Bake eggshells in the preheated oven until dry, 5 to 7 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove eggshells from the oven and pulverize using a mortar and pestle or a coffee grinder.

Directions.6: Place ground chicken, chicken livers, eggs, ground eggshells, and sunflower oil into a large skillet. Heat over medium heat, mixing occasionally, until ground chicken is browned and crumbly and livers are no longer pink, 5 to 7 minutes.

Directions.7: Place spinach on top of meat mixture in the skillet and cover with a lid to steam until soft, about 5 minutes.

Directions.8: Mash softened carrots and apples using a potato masher and add to meat mixture; mix together.
